txt.en: 'Tell me when you are ready, and I will bring you to see my friend. Step with care, for the way may be treacherous for mortals.'
You have done as the Maiden of the Gladden asked. Will she now help you uncover the cause of the darkness that has settled upon the Gladden Fields?
'My dear friend has suffered for too long. My song keeps him at peace. You have my trust, and may follow me to him.'
Shades in the Swamp: Only Half-Remembered
Talk to Gultháva and follow her into the flooded dwarf-hold of Kidzul-kâlah
The Maiden of the Gladden waits for you by the flooded dwarf-hold of Kidzul-kâlah.
